Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Northbound Reroute near 57th/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: Northbound 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, university, 57th and Woodlawn: due to, street blockage near 57th/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, university, 57th and Woodlawn: due to, street blockage near 57th/Woodlawn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park- bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due toa mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due toa mechanical problem. 

 Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Consider using the #22 Clark, #66 Milwaukee for alternate service through the affected area,

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
